# Set-up

```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(lterdatasampler)
```

```{r read-in-data}
fishes <- read_csv(here("data", "ntl6_v12.csv"))
```

```{r filtering-data}
perch_data <- fishes %>%
  filter(spname=="YELLOWPERCH") %>% 
  subset(select = c(year4, spname, length, weight))
```
